author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Iress Says FY Net Profit Attributable $59.8 Million
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Iress Ltd:
* FY REVENUE FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES $430 MILLION, UP 10 PERCENT
* ‍FY NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE $59.8 MILLION VERSUS $59.5 MILLION
* ‍FINAL DIVIDEND 28 CENTS PER SECURITY * “EXPECT GROWTH WEIGHTED TO SECOND HALF AND A DECLINE IN SEGMENT PROFIT IN 1H18”
* EXPECT 2018 SEGMENT PROFIT GROWTH TO BE IN RANGE OF 3 PERCENT - 7 PERCENT (ON A CONSTANT 2017 CURRENCY BASIS)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
